pr_title: Remove imprecise conversion with Number in MaterializedResult

timeline.message: Remove imprecise conversion with Number in MaterializedResult

timeline.bodyText:
Are we going to tackle more like that?
kokosing@m16:~/presto$ git grep '(Number) ' | wc -l
141
timeline.author: kokosing
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -250,22 +250,22 @@ private static void writeValue(Type type, BlockBuilder blockBuilder, Object valu
             blockBuilder.appendNull();

replies.bodyText: I think we should. Do you want to file an issue or make a PR?
replies.author: findepi
